item.title: GNU Tools on Windows with Cygwin and Vcxsrv
item.description: Like I said before in my Windows 10 review, I decided to try out Windows 10 as my work machine. If the global experience after two weeks is not that glorious, I still have some interesting little things for GNU/Linux enthusiasts stuck with Windows for whatever reason. As I canâ€™t decently work without a GNU environment, a decided to give Cygwin and VcXsrv a try. Quick reminder, Cygwin is
